Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CHAPTER 1272 Planned Unit Developments

1272.01Intent and objectives. 1272.02Definitions. 1272.03Permitted uses; categories of PUDs. 1272.04Area, density and lot regulations. 1272.05Interior streets. 1272.06Collector streets and major thoroughfares. 1272.07Off-street parking. 1272.08Common open space. 1272.09Pedestrian, bicycle circulation. 1272.10Underground utilities required. 1272.11Privacy. 1272.12Erosion and sedimentation control. 1272.125Exterior facade design standards. 1272.13Subdivision review; conflicts. 1272.14Establishment of a PUD. 1272.15Pre-application conference recommended. 1272.16PUD application step 1: amendment of official zoning map and general plan. 1272.17Amendment of official zoning map; general plan approval. 1272.18Revision to approved general plan. 1272.19PUD application step 2: final development plan. 1272.20Conditions for approval of final development plan. 1272.21Final development plan approval. 1272.22PUD application step 3: record plan. 1272.23Failure to begin or continue planned unit development. 1272.24Revision of approved final development plan. 1272.25Phasing. 1272.26Violations.
